summary: This package contains a suite of pytest unit tests for the Qt‑based user‑interface components of the TagStudio application. The tests cover panels for building and editing tags, field containers, flow layout widgets, folder‑to‑tag preview generation, item thumbnails, the main Qt driver, tag panels, tag search panels, and thumbnail rendering, verifying correct construction, interaction handling, state updates, and visual output.
business_intent: Validate and safeguard the functionality and visual correctness of TagStudio’s Qt UI, enabling reliable tag management, preview generation, and item representation while supporting continuous integration and preventing regressions in the user experience.
